```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read in some data

Read in the litters dataset.

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```
can load janitor package in the setup
but we only use one function, we don't need to do that
